Plot: A teenager accidentally activates a machine that enables him to speed up his body so that other people seem to be standing still.
Title: Clockstoppers
Writer: Rob Hedden (story), Andy Hedden (story), J. David Stem (story), David N. Weiss (story), Rob Hedden (screenplay), J. David Stem (screenplay), David N. Weiss (screenplay)
Actors: Jesse Bradford, French Stewart, Paula Garcés, Michael Biehn
tomatoConsensus: A pleasant diversion for the young teens, but a waste of time for anyone older.
